title: Collector Spotlight: NFT Alpha with Derek Edward Schloss of Flamingo DAO
description: Derek Edward Schloss of Collab+Currency and Flamingo DAO talks to Kevin about his philosophy on why scarce digital objects have value and how to measure the value of future projects.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: Derek Edward Schloss of Collab+Currency and Flamingo DAO talks to Kevin about his philosophy on why scarce digital objects have value and how to measure the value of future projects.
